text.data: Leviathan: Why do you hurry, Jormungand?[end]

Jormungand: The human girl... She is at her limit...
By bringing we four Holy Dragons together, she has exhausted her strength.[end]

Garuda: However... That means the door to the new era will not open...
Without gathering the strength of all the Holy Dragons, the door to the new era will not open...[end]

Jormungand: That is not a certainty... It has never been attempted.
The door to the new era... It may still yet open.[end]

Valitora: What will we do about Bahamut?
That would mean our minds will not be healed...[end]
Leviathan: Indeed... without Bahamut... The mistakes of the past shall be repeated...[end]

Jormungand: Can we not wait...
For once the door to the new era is opened, time shall be eternal...[end]
Valitora: However, if it does not open... This girl... No, we too will...[end]

Garuda: This human girl... She lacks something...
She lacks something as a Dragnar...[end]
Chapter 17 The Door to a New Era[end]
Monyooo!! [0x28]A message from Rush![0x29][end]
Manyooo!! [0x28]We work very hard because we're Mini-Devils![0x29][end]
Manyoo! [0x28]Okay, read it![0x29][end]

Monyomonyo!!
Rush: We can no longer listen to what Matelite says! From now on we're in command of the Resistance! It's better for [character][0x1] and everyone this way.[end]
Manyoo! [0x28]I'm not scared, but don't get mad! Rush wrote it, not me![0x29][end]
Munyoo!! [0x28]It's hard for Mini-Devils to read letters![0x29][end]
Monyoo! [0x28]Well, bye![0x29][end]
Manyooo! [0x28]We're going back to our Mini-Devil hideout!![0x29][end]
Munyoo!! [0x28]Take care of [character][0x1]! We'll all be praying to the god of death.[0x29][end]

Taicho: !!!???
What were the Mini-Devils causing a ruckus about?[end]

Matelite: ......
Monyooo... Manyooo... They just don't shut up!![end]
Matelite: What are [character][0x0] and the others doing at an important time like this?[end]

Taicho...!!
I'll go get them now. Take care of [character][0x1]![end][end]
